action_output_list: The user wants to dismiss the 'Permission error' dialog and then enable the 'Keep the screen on' feature. Since the app is Retro Music, I should open the app first.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Retro Music"}

The first step is to dismiss the 'Permission error' dialog. Since there is no dialog visible on the screen, I will navigate to the settings to enable the 'Keep the screen on' feature.{"action_type": "click", "index": 14}
To enable the 'Keep the screen on' feature, I need to scroll down to find the 'Other' section.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 8}
